formalpara.title: Figure 2. Visualization of intestinal lipid droplets in transparent bodies of C. elegans
formalpara.para: (A-B) Chemical structures of Nile Red (A) and Sudan Black (B). (C-E) Nile Red staining in wild-type N2 animals (C, D) and tub-1(nr2004) mutants (E). In panels D and E, the head of the animal is toward the bottom of the panel. (F-G) Sudan Black staining in wild-type N2 animals (F) and TGF-β receptor daf-1 (m40) mutants. The head of the animal is to the right.
